{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | 1=
void set_emit_on_sync( bool b ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Changes the current emit-on-sync policy. 

The value {{c|false}} (the default) indicates that any flush will be postponed until a call to emit. 

The value {{c|true}} makes flushes apply immediately.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par| b| new value for the emit-on-sync policy}}
{{par end}}
